rule.name: AS_IO_QE_getProductDetailsByCustomerId
rule.description: Queries IO product details by customer Id. Only returns products from incomplete onboardings, as the source of truth for onboarded products is the FS products table.
rule.definition: a!localVariables( local!requestIds: #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_33091"( /*FS products are the source of truth for onboarded products*/ /*and so should be queried from FS tables*/ statusCodes: #"_a-0000e539-6d59-8000-9bd0-011c48011c48_1209491"(), customerId: ri!customerId, executeWhen: #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_75782"(ri!customerId), includeNestedCdts: false, returnType: #"_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_290163" ).requestId, local!products: #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_114847"( requestId: local!requestIds, executeWhen: #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_75782"(local!requestIds), returnType: #"_a-0000e415-3035-8000-9bb2-011c48011c48_290163", sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"( field: "createdDatetime", ascending: true ) ), local!products )
